19 #include "QtDcmConvert.h"

21 #include <QtDcmManager.h>

24 #include <itkOrientedImage.h>

33 class QtDcmConvertPrivate
34 {
35 
36 public:
37  QString tempDirectory;
38  QString serieUID;
39  QString inputDirectory;
40  QString outputDirectory;
41  QString outputFilename;
42 };
43 
44 QtDcmConvert::QtDcmConvert ( QObject * parent ) : d ( new QtDcmConvertPrivate )
45 {
46  d->inputDirectory = "";
47  d->outputFilename = "";
48 }
49 
50 QtDcmConvert::~QtDcmConvert()
51 {
52  delete d;
53  d = NULL;
54 }
55 
56 
57 void QtDcmConvert::convert()
58 {
59  if (QtDcmPreferences::instance()->useDcm2nii())
60  {
61  QString program = QtDcmPreferences::instance()->getDcm2niiPath();
62  QStringList arguments;
63  arguments << "-x" << "N";
64  arguments << "-r" << "N";
65  arguments << "-g" << "N";
66  arguments << "-o" << d->outputDirectory << d->inputDirectory;
67 
68  QProcess * process = new QProcess(this);
69  process->setStandardOutputFile(d->tempDirectory + QDir::separator() + "logs" + QDir::separator() + d->serieUID + ".txt");
70  process->start(program, arguments);
71  process->waitForFinished();
72 
73  delete process;
74  }
75  else
76  {
77  typedef signed short PixelType;
78  const unsigned int Dimension = 3;
79  typedef itk::OrientedImage< PixelType, Dimension > ImageType;
80  typedef itk::ImageSeriesReader< ImageType > ReaderType;
81  typedef ImageType::RegionType RegionType;
82  typedef ImageType::SpacingType SpacingType;
83  typedef ImageType::PointType PointType;
84  typedef ImageType::DirectionType DirectionType;
85  typedef itk::ImageRegionIterator<ImageType> IteratorType;
86  typedef IteratorType::IndexType IndexType;
87  typedef itk::ImageFileWriter<ImageType> WriterType;
88  typedef itk::GDCMImageIO ImageIOType;
89  typedef itk::GDCMSeriesFileNames NamesGeneratorType;
90  typedef std::vector< std::string > FileNamesContainer;
91  typedef std::vector< std::string > SeriesIdContainer;
92 
93 // ImageType::Pointer image = 0;
94 
95  ReaderType::Pointer reader = ReaderType::New();
96  ImageIOType::Pointer dicomIO = ImageIOType::New();
97 
98  NamesGeneratorType::Pointer inputNames = NamesGeneratorType::New();
99  inputNames->SetUseSeriesDetails ( true );
100  inputNames->AddSeriesRestriction ( "0008|0021" );
101  inputNames->AddSeriesRestriction ( "0020,0037" );
102  inputNames->LoadSequencesOn();
103  inputNames->LoadPrivateTagsOn();
104  inputNames->SetInputDirectory ( d->inputDirectory.toStdString() );
105  try
106  {
107  const SeriesIdContainer & seriesUID = inputNames->GetSeriesUIDs();
108  std::string seriesIdentifier = seriesUID.begin()->c_str();
109  FileNamesContainer filenames = inputNames->GetFileNames ( seriesIdentifier );
110 
111  dicomIO->SetFileName ( filenames.begin()->c_str() );
112  try
113  {
114  dicomIO->ReadImageInformation();
115  }
116  catch ( itk::ExceptionObject &e )
117  {
118  qDebug() << e.GetDescription();
119  return;
120  }
121 
122  reader->UseStreamingOn();
123  reader->SetFileNames ( filenames );
124  reader->SetImageIO ( dicomIO );
125 
126  try
127  {
128  reader->Update();
129  }
130  catch ( itk::ExceptionObject &excp )
131  {
132  std::cerr << excp << std::endl;
133  return;
134  }
135 
136 // IteratorType itOut;
137 //
138 // image = reader->GetOutput();
139 //
140 // RegionType region;
141 // region.SetSize ( 0, image->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize() [0] );
142 // region.SetSize ( 1, image->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize() [1] );
143 // region.SetSize ( 2, image->GetLargestPossibleRegion().GetSize() [2] );
144 // image->SetRegions ( region );
145 // image->Allocate();
146 // SpacingType spacing;
147 // spacing[0] = image->GetSpacing() [0];
148 // spacing[1] = image->GetSpacing() [1];
149 // spacing[2] = image->GetSpacing() [2];
150 // spacing[3] = 1;
151 // image->SetSpacing ( spacing );
152 // PointType origin;
153 // origin[0] = image->GetOrigin() [0];
154 // origin[1] = image->GetOrigin() [1];
155 // origin[2] = image->GetOrigin() [2];
156 // origin[3] = 0;
157 // image->SetOrigin ( origin );
158 // DirectionType direction;
159 // for ( unsigned int i=0; i<4; i++ )
160 // for ( unsigned int j=0; j<4; j++ )
161 // {
162 // if ( ( i < 3 ) && ( j < 3 ) )
163 // direction[i][j] = image->GetDirection() [i][j];
164 // else
165 // direction[i][j] = ( i == j ) ? 1 : 0;
166 // }
167 // image->SetDirection ( direction );
168 // itOut = IteratorType ( image, region );
169 //
170 // image->SetMetaDataDictionary ( dicomIO->GetMetaDataDictionary() );
171 //
172 //
173 // itk::ImageRegionIterator<ImageType> itIn ( image, image->GetLargestPossibleRegion() );
174 // while ( !itIn.IsAtEnd() )
175 // {
176 // itOut.Set ( itIn.Get() );
177 // ++itIn;
178 // ++itOut;
179 // }
180 
181 
182  WriterType::Pointer writer = WriterType::New();
183 
184  QString completeFilename = d->outputDirectory + QDir::separator() + d->outputFilename;
185 
186  writer->SetFileName ( completeFilename.toStdString() );
187  writer->SetInput ( reader->GetOutput() );
188 // writer->SetInput ( image );
189 
190  try
191  {
192  writer->Update();
193  }
194  catch ( itk::ExceptionObject &ex )
195  {
196  std::cout << ex << std::endl;
197  return;
198  }
199  }
200  catch ( itk::ExceptionObject &ex )
201  {
202  std::cout << ex << std::endl;
203  return;
204  }
205  }
206 }
207 
208 void QtDcmConvert::setInputDirectory ( QString dir )
209 {
210  d->inputDirectory = dir;
211 }

221 }

226 }
